name: BookStack
description: Simple, self-hosted platform for organizing and storing information. Perfect wiki alternative.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  db:
    image: mariadb:latest
    container_name: bookstack-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD={{DB_PASSWORD}}
      - MYSQL_DATABASE=bookstack
      - MYSQL_USER=bookstack
      - MYSQL_PASSWORD={{DB_PASSWORD}}
    volumes:
      - {{DB_PATH}}:/var/lib/mysql
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=bookstack"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=productivity"

  bookstack:
    image: lscr.io/linuxserver/bookstack:latest
    container_name: bookstack
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - APP_URL={{APP_URL}}
      - DB_HOST=db
      - DB_USER=bookstack
      - DB_PASS={{DB_PASSWORD}}
      - DB_DATABASE=bookstack
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:80"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/config
    depends_on:
      - db
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=bookstack"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=productivity"

notes: Change credentials immediately after first login
Great for documentation, notes, and wikis
